responses: Bot: Hello! How can I help?
Bot: What can I do for you?
Bot: Thanks for talking to me! Have a great day!
Bot: I am the CSUF Portal Bot! I can help answer questions about the CSUF Portal!

Bot: Log into the CSUF Portal and follow these instructions to view your classes: 
1. Click on Titan Online icon on the top right (cube icon) 
2. Click on 'Student Homepage' to open your student profile 
3. Click on 'Manage Classes' to view classes your currently taking

Bot: For general academic adivising, log into CSUF Portal and follow these instructions: 
1. On the left search bar and search 'advising' to reduce options in USER APPS 
2. Click on the 'Academic Adivising Student' under USER APPS 
3. Click on 'Virtual Academic Advising Center' to arrive at the Academic Advising Center webpage. 
  Appointments and pop-in adivising are available here 
 
For department specific academic advising, your have better luck doing the following: 
1. Go on your prefered search engine 
2. Search up 'CSUF', your department, and 'academic advising' and clicking on the first CSUF link. 
3. On your department homepage you can find a place to schedule an appointment

Bot: You can view the academic calendar here: 
https://apps.fullerton.edu/AcademicCalendar

Bot: Log into the CSUF Portal and use this link to get to your canvas dashboard: 
https://csufullerton.instructure.com

BOT: If you like to schedule an appointment with a CSUF councelor, call the Counseling & Psychology Service number: (657) 278-3040. 
 
We offer counseling for individial, couple, group, psychiatric and crisis. 
For more information visit: https://www.fullerton.edu/caps/services/appointments/appointment.php 
 
If you need help immediately, call (800) 273-8255 for Natioanl Suicide Prevention Lifeline.

Bot: You can view the available parking here: 
https://parking.fullerton.edu/ParkingLotCounts/mobile.aspx

Bot: Log into the CSUF Portal and use this link to go to the Parking Portal: 
https://csufparking.t2hosted.com/Account/Portal 
 
Here you can view parking services: permits, parking citations, and vehicle registration
